StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ssn varchar(9) as
declare @person_id as int declare @nwa_id as int declare @contract_id as int declare @ship_id as int declare @ship_date as date.me declare @disch_date as date.me
set @ssn = '247717622'
set @person_id = (select person_id from person where social_security_number = @ssn)
if @person_id is not null begin set @nwa_id = (select max(nwa_id) from nwa where marine_candidate_id = @person_id) --select 'NWA ID = ' + convert(varchar, @nwa_id) as message if @nwa_id is not null begin set @contract_id = (select contract_id from contract where nwa_id = @nwa_id) --select 'CONTRACT ID = ' + convert(varchar, @contract_id) as message if @contract_id is not null begin set @ship_id = (select ship_id from shipper where contract_id = @contract_id) --select 'SHIP ID = ' + convert(varchar, @SHIP_id) as message if @ship_id is not null begin set @ship_date = (select ship_date from shipper where ship_id = @ship_id) select 'SHP' as status,'Person shipped to bootcamp on ' + convert(varchar, @ship_date, 106) as message end else begin set @disch_date = (select discharge_date from contract where contract_id = @contract_id) if @disch_date is not null begin select 'DIS' as status, 'Person Discharged from Marine DEP on ' + convert(varchar, @disch_date, 106) as message end else select 'DEP' as status, 'Person is current in Marine DEP.' as message end end else select 'UNK' as status, 'Person is not under contract with USMC.' as message end else select 'UNK' as status, 'Person never processed with USMC.' as message end else select 'UNK' as status, @ssn + ' not found.' as message
